name: Jonathan Sahagun
text: The Judge Dredd approach might work for petty holdapers and riding-in-tande ms, but I doubt it will be effective against organized crime syndicates and deep-rooted circles of institutionaliz ed corruption within the government. All we'll get is a huge death toll consisting mostly of fall guys, frameup victims, and disposables.
